column5: Not sure how many people check the Hook - Up section but if anyone is able to get out on Nipissing next week check the Hook- up section and PM me,  Thanks  Benny
Well, if that is an accurate avatar....do you mind if I do the driving?  lol
Ha, you would have to ask Tucker... He is partial to driving. Also he is older now since that picture another years experience ; )
Could you clarify whether you are offering to take someone out in yer boat, or are you looking fer someone to take you out in theirs?
I'm goin out lookin for ride alongs ......
